mapper.select: SELECT M.REGIST_TEAM_ID, M.REGIST_TEAM_INFO, T.PLAYGROUND, M.RESERVATION_STADIUM, M.MATCHING_STYLE FROM MATCHING_CARD M JOIN TEAM T ON M.REGIST_TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID

SELECT M.GAME_DATE, M.REGIST_TEAM_ID, M.RESERVATION_STADIUM, M.MATCHING_STYLE FROM MATCHING_CARD M JOIN TEAM T ON M.REGIST_TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID WHERE T.PLAYGROUND LIKE '%'||#{condition}||'%' OR M.REGIST_TEAM_ID LIKE '%'||#{condition}||'%' OR M.MATCHING_STYLE LIKE '%'||#{condition}||'%'

SELECT MC.MATCHING_NUMBER, MC.GAME_DATE, MC.APPLIED_TEAM_ID, MC.RESERVATION_STADIUM, MC.MATCHING_STYLE, SM.COMMENTS FROM SCHEDULED_MATCHING SM JOIN MATCHING_CARD MC ON SM.MATCHING_NUMBER = MC.MATCHING_NUMBER WHERE MC.REGIST_TEAM_ID = #{team_id} UNION SELECT MC.MATCHING_NUMBER, MC.GAME_DATE, MC.REGIST_TEAM_ID, MC.RESERVATION_STADIUM, MC.MATCHING_STYLE, SM.COMMENTS FROM SCHEDULED_MATCHING SM JOIN MATCHING_CARD MC ON SM.MATCHING_NUMBER = MC.MATCHING_NUMBER WHERE MC.APPLIED_TEAM_ID = #{team_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCHING_CARD (MATCHING_NUMBER, GAME_DATE, REGIST_TEAM_ID, REGIST_TEAM_INFO, RESERVATION_STADIUM, MATCHING_STYLE) VALUES (MATCHING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{game_date}, #{team_id}, #{regist_team_info}, #{reservation_stadium}, #{matching_style})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATCHING_CARD WHERE REGIST_TEAM_ID =#{team_id} AND ACCOMPLISH ='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MATCHING_CARD SET ACCOMPLISH='Y' WHERE MATCHING_NUMBER=#{matching_number}
UPDATE MATCHING_CARD SET APPLIED_TEAM_ID = NULL, APPLIED_TEAM_INFO=NULL WHERE MATCHING_NUMBER=#{matching_number} AND ACCOMPLISH='N'
